etomica.normalmode

Class MeterHarmonicEnergy

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.data.DataSourceScalar
      • etomica.normalmode.MeterHarmonicEnergy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDataSource, IEtomicaDataSource

    public class MeterHarmonicEnergy
extends DataSourceScalar
    Meter that calculates the harmonic energy of a configuration given eigenvectors and omegas corresponding to wave vectors.
